content.prompt: Which of the following was true of colonial New England?

choices.label: It consisted of loosely organized communities spread some distance apart.
Its economy was dependent on large-scale farming and trading.
Life was centered in clustered villages with farmland surrounding the villages.
Villages and small towns were tightly organized around an artisan community.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
